title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Jan 22 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Jan 22 2022
description:
Buck tests positive for covid, broadcasts from quarantine. He says he's told his friends that Omicron is so mild that it's more like "wimpycron." Clay concurs: "I had Omicron, you have it right now, and so we've experienced what we believe is exactly what this virus does to your body and the answer is for most people it's not very significant." Fourth vaccine dose fails in small Israeli study. Democrats claim racist Republicans stop people from voting: Who are these people who supposedly can't vote? Things you can't say: "owner," "master," "cloth masks don't work" -- even though the "experts" now agree.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
